name: 'Belfast' Long Waterproof Winter Rain Jacket
description:
Size Info

XS=0, S=2-4, M=6-8, L=10-12, XL=14.

Details & Care

A waterproof and windproof Helly Tech® jacket cut in a feminine A-line shape helps you navigate inclement weather without sacrificing style. PrimaLoft® insulation offers warmth and breathable comfort as the seasons grow colder, while the fixed hood, adjustable cuffs and drawcord hem keep heat inside, and water out.

34" length (size Medium).
Front zip closure with zipper garage protects your neck.
Front zip pockets; zip chest pocket.
Smooth flatlock seaming won't rub or irritate.
DWR (durable water-repellent) finish helps repel water to keep you dry.
Quick-dry lining, with 100g PrimaLoft insulation.
100% polyester.
Machine wash, tumble dry low.
By Helly Hansen; imported.
Women's Active & Swim.
Item #861207

Helpful info:

Ingredients

Shell: 100% Polyester - Lining: 100% Polyamide - Insulation body: 80% Polyester (Recycled), 20% Polyester - Insulation sleeves: 80% Polyester (Recycled), 20% Polyester

HELLY HANSEN

For nearly 140 years, Helly Hansen has revolutionized outdoor sportswear with professional-quality gear designed to protect adventurers in extreme conditions. Founded by Norwegian captain Helly Juell Hansen, the brand got its start waterproofing gear for sailors battling the harsh Scandinavian seas. With its high-tech fabrications and innovative designs, Helly Hansen continues to protect outdoor enthusiasts around the world.

name: Alpine Air Insulated Jacket
description:
Details & Care

There's a ton of tech packed into this slim, insulated jacket that itself packs down into a pocket for easy portability. The geometric quilting holds in place the PrimaLoft® P.U.R.E. Black synthetic fill, that's produced using reduced emissions entirely from post consumer plastic waste. A DWR (durable water repellent) finish shrugs off everything the elements throw at you. And the front zipper tucks into a zipper garage to protect your chin while an interior draft flap stops the creep of chill in its tracks.

Stand collar
PFC-free durable water-repellent (DWR) finish
Packable
Lined with 60g PrimaLoft P.U.R.E. Black synthetic fill
PrimaLoft® lightweight insulation retains warmth in wet or dry conditions
100% recycled nylon
Machine wash, line dry
Imported
This product meets Nordstrom Sustainably Sourced Materials criteria: contains at least 50% sustainably sourced materials
Item #7283612

A clothing and lifestyle brand for persistent people who are true to their passions, Volcom embodies the creative spirit of youth culture as well as the principles of liberation, innovation and experimentation.
